Based on your preferences for a monarch movie, I would recommend "The Lion King" (1994) directed by Rob Minkoff and produced by Walt Disney Pictures Studios.
This is a classic Disney film that features stunning animation and memorable songs including the title song "The Lion King" which won four Academy Awards including Best Picture.
The story follows Simba, the young prince of Africa who dreams of one day becoming king himself.
However, Simba's dream is threatened by his uncle Scar, who has been grooming Simba to take over the throne from him.
In a dramatic climax, Simba must confront Scar and prove that he is worthy of being king.
Overall, "The Lion King" is an incredibly entertaining and heartwarming Disney film that I would highly recommend to anyone.
